page.title: 08Recreation Littlebourne Area
page.content: Littlebourne is fortunate in having a large recreation ground, Recreation Club based in the village hall which organises sport and the clubroom. The ground incorporates a football pitch, 3 teams play each week in the winter + 3 cricket teams in the summer. The ground is cut by KCC + kept tidy by a groundsman. There used to be a bowling green + tennis court. In the clubroom darts + billiards are available + Bat and Trap outside. Badminton is played on Wednesday nights Hall booking have to be made in the club room. New stage curtains were bought with the money left over from the Silver Jubilee. There are swings + climbing frame. Wickhambreux has just been given a recreation ground. It was opened this summer with a fete + hot air balloon giving views over the village.
